mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products(product_id, product_name, sku, price, stock_quantity, category) VALUES(#{productId}, #{productName}, #{sku}, #{price}, #{stockQuantity}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_name=#{productName}, sku=#{sku}, price=#{price}, stock_quantity=#{stockQuantity}, category=#{category} WHERE product_id=#{productId}
